To update subtrees:

```
git fetch iPlug2
git subtree pull --prefix thirdparty/iPlug2 iPlug2 retroplug --squash
```
```
git fetch SameBoy
git subtree pull --prefix thirdparty/SameBoy SameBoy retroplug --squash
```
```
git fetch taojson
git subtree pull --prefix thirdparty/taojson taojson master --squash
```
